      • print

        public void print(javax.print.attribute.PrintRequestAttributeSet attributes)
           throws java.awt.print.PrinterException
        Because some printer exhibit odd margin and fonts behavior. this print action will trap the request and resets the top and left margin, but put it on the page format.
        Overrides:
        print in class java.awt.print.PrinterJob
        Throws:
        java.awt.print.PrinterException
